channel.title: Medical on IPS Displays
channel.description: Recent content in Medical on IPS Displays

item.title: 10.1" IPS – 1920×1200 (Full HD+)
item.description:
Why this panel

  • Sharp UI, fine typography, DICOM-like gamma tuning option

Options

  • Optical bonding to reduce haze & improve outdoor readability.

item.title: 5.0" IPS – 800×480 (WVGA)
item.description:
Why choose it

  • Mature ecosystem, easy mechanical integration
  • High brightness option (1,000 nits) for semi-outdoor

Options

  • Strengthened cover lens, anti-smudge coating, lamination.
